itunes:title: 18 Consider the Character of the Athenian
title: 18 Consider the Character of the Athenian
description:
On the eve of the great war between Athens and Sparta, a speech was given to the Spartans, warning them of the character of the enemy they were about to take on. The formidable but stolid, deliberate and cautious Spartans would soon face the daring, unpredictable, reckless, audacious combatants of Athens. Which side would win ... and to what expedients would it have to sink to achieve victory?

New episodes every Monday

Subscribe wherever you get your podcasts
